childMarkdownRemark.html:
Now, this is a story all about how, my life got flipped-turned upside down, and I'd like to take a minute, just sit right there, I'll tell you how I became the prince of a town called KL

In Scunthorpe, UK, born and raised, on the playground was where I spent most of my days, chillin' out maxin' relaxin' all cool, and all shootin some b-ball outside of the school, when a couple of guys who were up to no good, started making trouble in my neighborhood, I got in one little fight and my mom got scared, she said 'You're movin' with your father in Kuala Lumpur'

Hey y'all,

My name is Matthew, but you can just call me Matt. I'm a Full Stack Web Developer and I started my software journey back in 2018.

I am currently a Mentor at NEXT Academy, Malaysia, teaching the next wave of budding young coders so they can make their first steps into the wonderful world of Software Development.

I started my journey with Ruby and Ruby-On-Rails and I then ventured off into React and Python as the main language/library that I code. Currently, I would say I am more of a backend developer than I am a frontend developer but I am continously improving on my design and UI skills to be a better frontend developer (anyone who codes knows how difficult frontend can be hahaha).

I am always open to learning new technologies as I try and find the stacks that I love and enjoy coding in the most. In my eyes, when you love what you do, that's when you truly excel in it.

If you would like to know more about me, you can go and checkout my blog for my more in depth introduction to myself.

But for now, I shall leave it there.

Thanks, Matt :)

Here are the current technology stacks I am working with or I am familiar with. Since the evolution of technology is ever changing in the software world, this list will more than likely change from time to time as the stacks I work with and the technology I know grows.
